033.name: The Bible
033.text: temporary flight, instantly kills mom / it lives

034.name: The Book of Belial
034.text: guarantees deals, x1.5 dmg with blood of the martyr, temporary +2 dmg

040.name: Kamikaze
040.text: .5 heart dmg to self, 40 dmg explosion

042.name: Bob's Rotten Head
042.text: shoots a poison bomb (50 dmg + 6-8 / tick)

049.name: Shoop Da Whoop
049.text: shoots a blood laser (current dmg x 7)

055.name: Mom's Eye
055.text: chance to shoot a 2nd tear backwards

062.name: Charm of the Vampire
062.text: heals half heart every 13 enemy deaths

064.name: Steam Sale
064.text: all shop items are half price

069.name: Chocolate Milk
069.text: charge tears (max is 4x dmg and 2.5x delay)

072.name: Rosary
072.text: puts the bible into most item pools

075.name: PhD
075.text: bad stat pills become good, free pill

076.name: X-Ray Vision
076.text: automatically opens secret and super secret rooms

078.name: Book of Revelations

084.text: spawns a trapdoor (10% chance of crawl space / black market)

087.name: Loki's Horns
087.text: chance to shoot 4 tears instead of 1

089.name: Spider Bite
089.text: chance to shoot a slowing tear

091.name: Spelunker Hat
091.text: see adjacent special rooms on the map

094.text: spawns a coin every 2 rooms cleared

096.name: Little C.H.A.D.
096.text: spawns a half heart every 2 rooms cleared

098.name: The Relic
098.text: spawns a soul heart every 4 rooms cleared

099.name: Little Gish
099.text: familiar (3.5 dmg / tear, chance to slow)

103.text: chance to shoot a poison tear

104.name: The Parasite
104.text: shots split in 2 pieces, each does 1/4 damage

106.name: Mr. Mega
106.text: +5 bombs, bomb blast radius increased, bomb dmg increased from 50 to 110

108.name: The Wafer
108.text: all dmg is reduced to half a heart

110.name: Mom's Contacts
110.text: chance to shoot a freeze tear, range delayed

114.name: Mom's Knife
114.text: replaces tears with a knife (current dmg x 2 / tick)

116.name: 9 Volt
116.text: quicker charge, fully charges current item on pickup

117.name: Dead Bird
117.text: spawns a bird familiar when hit (2 dmg / tick)

118.name: Brimstone
118.text: tears become blood laser, hits 12 or 13 times

122.name: Whore of Babylon
122.text: only works with low red health

126.name: Razor Blade
126.text: deals 1 heart dmg to self, gives a temporary +1.2 dmg per use

131.name: Bomb Bag
131.text: spawns a bomb every 2 rooms cleared

135.name: IV Bag
135.text: spawns coins and deals dmg to self

142.name: Scapular
142.text: +1 soul heart if hit to half a red heart (once per room)

144.name: Bum Friend
144.text: turns floor money into other pickups

150.name: Tough Love
150.text: chance to fire teeth tears (current dmg x 3.2)

151.name: The Mulligan
151.text: 1/6 chance for blue fly on tear hit, effectively x1.33 damage

156.name: Habit
156.text: recharge one tick of space charge when hit

157.name: Bloody Lust
157.text: +dmg when hit (only for the current floor, max +6.5 dmg at 6 hits)

158.name: Crystal Ball
158.text: reveals the floor and spawns a card, rune, or soul heart

162.name: Celtic Cross
162.text: shield when hit, based on luck

168.name: Epic Fetus
168.text: replaces tears with missiles (current dmg x 20)

171.name: Spider Butt
171.text: temporarily slows enemies and deals 10 dmg

173.name: Mitre
173.text: better chance of finding soul hearts

178.name: Holy Water
178.text: creates a pool when hit (8 dmg / tick)

186.name: Blood Rights
186.text: deals 1 heart dmg to self, deals 40 dmg to all enemies

198.name: Box
198.text: spawns 1 coin, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 heart, 1 card, 1 pill, and 1 trinket

199.name: Mom's Key
199.text: more pickups from chests, spawns 2 keys

202.name: Midas Touch
202.text: contact dmg equal to number of cents held

203.name: Humbling Bundle
203.text: doubles coin, key, bomb, and heart pickups

204.name: Fanny Pack
204.text: chance to spawn a coin, bomb, or key when hit

205.name: Sharp Plug
205.text: deals 2 heart dmg to self, fully recharges item (only when at 0 charge)

209.name: Butt Bombs
209.text: +5 bombs, bombs confuse all enemies, bombs deal 10 dmg to all enemies

214.name: Anemic
214.text: makes a trail of creep when hit

217.name: Mom's Wig
217.text: chance to spawn blue spiders when shooting

218.name: Placenta
218.text: chance to heal half a heart every minute

219.name: Old Bandage
219.text: chance to drop a red heart on hit

224.name: Cricket's Body
224.text: shots split in 4 pieces, each deals half damage

225.name: Gimpy
225.text: chance to spawn soul/black hearts on hit, chance for enemies to drop half a red heart

230.name: Abaddon
230.text: lose red hearts, chance for fear shots

231.name: Ball of Tar
231.text: chance to shoot slowing tears, makes a trail of slowing creep

234.name: Infestation 2
234.text: spawns a blue spider on enemy death

236.name: E. Coli
236.text: enemies turn to poop on touch

238.name: Key Piece #1
238.text: both key pieces together unlock the door to mega satan

239.name: Key Piece #2
239.text: both key pieces together unlock the door to mega satan

240.name: Experimental Treatment
240.text: randomly increases or decreases stats (doesn't swap)

241.name: Contract From Below
241.text: doubles pickups, increased chance of double boss fights

242.name: Infamy
242.text: chance to block a projectile (from any direction)

243.name: Trinity Shield
243.text: blocks all projectiles from the front

244.name: Tech.5
244.text: chance to fire an additional laser (scales with dmg, ignores tear rate)

246.name: Blue Map
246.text: reveals secret and super secret rooms

248.name: Hive Mind
248.text: blue spiders and flies do 2x dmg

249.name: There's Options
249.text: choice of 2 items after each boss

254.name: Blood Clot
254.text: +1 flat dmg and +5 range for every 2nd shot

256.name: Hot Bombs
256.text: 5 bombs, leaves fires that do 22 dmg

257.name: Fire Mind
257.text: burns enemies, chance to shoot exploding tears (current dmg x 2 + 22)

258.name: Missing No.
258.text: rerolls your items on pickup and on the start of every floor

261.name: Proptosis
261.text: between x2 and x1.3 dmg based on range

262.name: Missing Page 2
262.text: deals 40 dmg to enemies on hit if 1 heart or lower

264.name: Smart Fly
264.text: spawns a fly familiar when hit (1.5 dmg / tick)

265.name: Dry Baby
265.text: blocks projectiles, chance to deal 40 dmg to the room on block

266.name: Juicy Sack
266.text: spawns blue spiders, makes a trail of slowing creep

271.name: Mystery Sack
271.text: drops hearts, coins, bombs, or keys

274.name: Best Bud
274.text: spawns a fly orbital when hit (5 dmg / tick)

278.name: Dark Bum
278.text: converts 1.5 red heart pickups to a soul heart or spider

283.name: D100
283.text: rerolls current items and items+pickups in the room

286.name: Blank Card
286.text: mimics the effect of the currently held card or rune

287.name: Book of Secrets
287.text: randomly get map, compass, or blue map for the floor

295.name: Magic Fingers
295.text: deals current dmg x 2 to the room, takes 1 coin per use

297.name: Pandora's Box
297.text: B1 2soul, B2 2bomb + 2key, C1 boss, C2 boss + 2soul, D1 4soul, D2 20coin, W1 2boss, W2 bible, sheol devil+sin, cath angel+white, DR coin, chest coin

300.name: Aries
300.text: 18 contact dmg if moving fast enough

301.name: Cancer
301.text: all dmg is reduced to half a heart (after getting hit in the room)

303.name: Virgo
303.text: chance of shield when hit, bad stat pills become good

304.name: Libra
304.text: evens out stats, +6 bombs, +6 keys, +6 cents

305.name: Scorpio
305.text: chance to shoot a poison tear

311.name: Judas' Shadow
311.text: +1 life (will respawn as black judas with high damage multiplier)

312.name: Maggy's Bow
312.text: red heart pickups count for double

316.name: Cursed Eye
316.text: charge shots, random teleport if hit during the first second of charging

322.name: Mongo Baby
322.text: familiar (copies other familiars or 3.5 dmg / tear)

324.name: Undefined
324.text: randomly teleport to item, secret, super secret, error, or black market

326.name: Breath of Life
326.text: invincibility when charge bar hits zero

327.name: The Polaroid
327.text: temporary shield when hit at 1/2 heart, can enter the chest

328.name: The Negative
328.text: damage enemies when hit at 1/2 heart, can enter the dark room

337.name: Broken Watch
337.text: chance to slow (or speed up) enemies

366.text: We put bombs in your bombs!
366.name: Scatter Bombs
